Reviews.Title: “Dont expect to sleep”
Reviews.Author: gastonglock22
Reviews.Content: am writing review san diego bed boxspring mattress laying floor night hear banging alarms 4 nights worst hotel stayed 10 traveling straddle toilet close bath door shower oh ya dont expect cleaned daily basis unless otherwise rest hong kong pretty friendly

Reviews.Title: “"WORST" of Hong Kong"”
Reviews.Author: liveinAsia
Reviews.Content: travel hong kong regularly shop eat world class food trip oct 2011 mistake staying san diego hotel kowloon price 200 night shocking clean unless woke middle night night entire stay 5 nights car alarm told hotel managers car save yourself huge disapointment stay royal 3 star bp international nice service miss ruths chris steak house kowloon american steak house asia fresh grade steaks daily service world class thier customers time walk door remember name exactly toppings baked potatoe time kowloon stop patrick thailand sent youi promise return againthe hong kong

HotelInfo.Address: 169-181 Wusong Street, Kowloon, Hong Kong, China
